original_title: Germany’s Merz facing opposition over Ukraine troop plan – Bild — RT World News
article_summary: US imposes sanctions on ICC officials for pursuing cases against American soldiers and Israeli officials, including Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu. The ICC, which is not a party to the US or Israel, condemns the sanctions as an attack on its independence. Meanwhile, Israel has launched an operation to take over Gaza City, with Prime Minister Netanyahu ordering a shortened timeline for the defeat of Hamas.</s>
